subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Anthony Grant, the Crimson Tide’s third-year basketball coach, suspended the team’s two leading scorers and two leading rebounders, derailing a promising start.
snippet: Anthony Grant, the Crimson Tide’s third-year basketball coach, suspended the team’s two leading scorers and two leading rebounders, derailing a promising start.
